summary: MY COMPLAINT IS WITH THE PASSENGER AIR BAG. IT KEEPS TURNING OFF AND ON. THEY HAVE A RECALL FOR IT BUT HAS NOT COME UP WITH A SOLUTION. I HAVE A 2010 YOU THINK IT WOULDNT TAKE 8 YEARS TO FIX A PROBLEM. I HAVE MY DAUGHTER AND MY ELDERLY MOTHER IN MY CAR ALL THE TIME. THE ONE REASON I BOUGHT THIS CAR WAS FOR SAFETY BUT NOT  THE AIR BAG CAN EXPLODE AND HURT THEM. WE HAVE WAITED AND WAITING AND IT HASN'T BEEN FIXED. I WONT LET ANYONE RIDE IN MY FRONT SEAT ANYMORE BECAUSE WE ARE SCARED SOMEONE WILL GET HURT. WITCH PUTS US IN A BIND WITH NOT ENOUGH ROOM IN MY CAR. WHEN WILL THIS BE FIXED BY THEM. AND NO I CAN NOT AFFORD A RENTAL UNTIL THEY FIX IT. THANK YOU FOR ANY INFO YOU CAN GIVE ME.
